caption: This photograph features a close-up view of the glowing flames from a combustion process, possibly from a gas burner or a similar source. The main focus of the image shows three prominent flame tips that are bright and pointed, emitting a warm, yellow-orange light. These flame tips have rounded bases that merge into a less distinct, hotter, and brighter area below them, where the combustion is more intense. The flames appear translucent and ethereal, with the tips cooling into darker, more defined shapes against a very dark, nearly black background. The absence of any additional objects or distractions emphasizes the flamesâ€™ vivid details and the dynamic nature of fire.
title: Two "soda straw" stalactites hang from the ceiling in bridal cave.  This is the beginning of growths which, hundreds of years from now, could reach from floor to ceiling if left undisturbed hundreds of caves honeycomb this region of Missouri.  A few, such as bridal cave, have been commercially developed
